title: #14: The Controlled Demolition of the 9/11 Narrative | Richard Gage
description:
On September 11th, 2001, the world as we knew it changed forever. Even if we wanted to forget that day, the media has made that an impossibility by replaying that snuff film over and over again while always making sure to remind us that terrorists from the Middle East hate us for our freedoms.

In the almost two decades since that day, the wheels of the official story have started to come off, thanks in large part to the tireless work of people like Richard Gage and his organization, Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth.

With thousands of professional architects and engineers joining forces to explain that the official story of 9/11 is a scientific impossibility, it won’t be long before the world is forced to take another look at what actually happened on that day.
